about_the_game:
Set Contents:

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Sandalphon)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Galleon) (Releasing Spring 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Wilnas) (Releasing Summer 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Meg) (Releasing Fall 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Ilsa) (Releasing Early 2026)

• 4 Color Variants (no. 5–8) for the 5 DLC characters

• 3 Weapon Skins (no. 2–4) for the 5 DLC characters

• New Stage: Canaan Shrine

• Premium Avatar: Sandalphon (Dark)

Notice:

- Some content in this set is also available as a stand-alone purchase. The additional characters included in this set are also purchasable as GBVSR Character Pass 2. Ensure you are not making a duplicate purchase.

- In order to use this content, you will need the full paid game, which is sold separately. The latest content update may be required.

- Content will gradually become available after the game is released.

- This set includes some content that can be obtained separately in the in-game Rupie Shop.
detailed_description:
Set Contents:

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Sandalphon)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Galleon) (Releasing Spring 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Wilnas) (Releasing Summer 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Meg) (Releasing Fall 2025)

• 4 Color Variants (no. 5–8) for the 5 DLC characters

• 3 Weapon Skins (no. 2–4) for the 5 DLC characters

• New Stage: Canaan Shrine

• Premium Avatar: Sandalphon (Dark)

Notice:

- Some content in this set is also available as a stand-alone purchase. The additional characters included in this set are also purchasable as GBVSR Character Pass 2. Ensure you are not making a duplicate purchase.

- In order to use this content, you will need the full paid game, which is sold separately. The latest content update may be required.

- Content will gradually become available after the game is released.
